products.title: Santiago Cotton Purple Mauve Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Santiago cotton purple mauve roman blind in purple. Made to measure from 14.99 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their santiago cotton roman blinds are carefully made, look beautiful when fitted, and are light and durable. 
 This purple mauve cottonroman blind, introduces a soft purple shade to your window, and looks fabulous either with matching or contrasting accessories. 
 Add a touch of luxury to your home with their hand-made roman blinds. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why not only is this roman hand-made by an expert team, but it also comes with a free five year warranty, for extra peace of mind. 
 
 Product id: db-irom0006 fabric colour: purple mauve material: 100% cotton plain dyed lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.   Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Brookstone Heather Purple Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Brookstone heather purple roman blind in purple. Made to measure from 23.65 with free uk mainland delivery. This roman blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The modern geometric shapes on the brookstone roman blind in heather purple can be adapted to particular places. This rich looking fabric will look stunny when paired with dark woods. Use in dining rooms or living rooms to give a stately finish, or to a kitchen to balance the contrasting colours. Made from the optimal blend of cotton fabrics, youll be certain your choice will be suitable for every room and function.

products.title: Kingsley Heather Purple Roman Blind

products.productdescription:
The kingsley roman blind in heather offers a subdued accent to dark and light rooms alike. Imagine this against grey paintwork, offsetting navy walls or accenting white or pastels. Weve created this from a fabric that is suited to any room because we know, that with such a versatile design you could as easily want this in your bathroom as you would your lounge.

products.title: Emi, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Emi, mulberry - roman blind to help maximise a smaller space, use soothing pastel shades and attractive prints like the emi mulberry blind. A delicate arrangement of white and mauve inspired flowers sits on a soothing oatmeal base providing a refreshing b
products.productdescription: To help maximise a smaller space, use soothing pastel shades and attractive prints like the emi mulberry blind. A delicate arrangement of white and mauve inspired flowers sits on a soothing oatmeal base providing a refreshing burst of personality to any room in the home. Choose material in hues that will complement the striking colours of the mulberry, sticking to a comforting palette of dusky pink, mauve, and little bursts of fuschia. Keep walls a subtle cream or oatmeal, helping to boost the delicate floral by blending with mildly blushed fabrics and complementing accessories. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Faux Suede, Purple - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Faux suede, purple - roman blind create an elegant and regal look with the faux suede in purple, where daring and courageous mauve meets a soothing, velvety cloth to form an eye-catching blind with modish texture, gorgeous colouring, and stacks of style.
products.productdescription: Create an elegant and regal look with the faux suede in purple, where daring and courageous mauve meets a soothing, velvety cloth to form an eye-catching blind with modish texture, gorgeous colouring, and stacks of style. Match the impressive purple with soft furnishings and fabrics in similar shades of aubergine and damson, creating a continued intense burst of colour full of tempting texture. Incorporate gilded accessories and golden hued oddments to form a more glamorous finish to an imperial look.Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Gainsborough Mulberry Roman Blind
products.metadescription: A classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home. This gainsborough mulberry roman blind takes traditional tartan and infuses it with rich berry shades alongside neutral and natural tones to great effect. The end result is a beautiful, cosy window dress
products.productdescription: A classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home. The end result is a beautiful, cosy window dress

products.title: Amelie, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Amelie, mulberry - roman blind the amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the st
products.productdescription: The amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the structured arches of the roman, creating a sumptuous yet rural theme that will suit any country home. Bring your country kitchen to life by joining the mulberry with the natural weaves of wicker and hessian and accompanying with rustic, unfinished woods. Let your imagination run wild when choosing complementary tones, staying away from a structured colour scheme. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.

products.title: Polka Dot Purple Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Emma bridgewaters popular polka dot pattern is full of cheerfulness. The little pops and dots of colour on this polka dot purple roman blind, with shades of purple, red, green and yellow on cream, will always signify 'instant fun! Get spotty and go dotty in your kitchen and uti
products.productdescription: Emma bridgewaters popular polka dot pattern is full of cheerfulness. products.title: Kent, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Kent, mulberry - roman blind if one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a hom
products.productdescription: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings. Keep sofas and chairs in either purple or cream, with cushions in opposing colours, incorporating a pretty pattern if you can. Please note: roman blinds over 130cm wide require vertical seams due to limited fabric width. We recommended you split large windows into smaller blinds.
